summary: Backstreet Boys, often called BSB, is an American boy band formed in 1993. The original members are Nick Carter, Howie Dorough, AJ McLean, Brian Littrell, and Kevin Richardson. They became famous with their first album in 1996 and had big hits with songs like "I Want It That Way." The group has sold over 130 million records worldwide, making them the best-selling boy band ever. They've been together for over 30 years and still perform today. In 2013, they got a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame.
title: Backstreet Boys
